animeTitle: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Movie 1: Beginnings
otherNames: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Movie 1: Hajimari no Monogatari, 劇場版 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ 始まりの物語
synopsis: First two films are a compilation of the television series and the third film is an all-new story.Urobuchi Gen said that the third film's story coincidentally matches the lyrics to Kalafina's television ending theme song Magia if one examines them carefully.
